alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lee, southwestern Wake and southeastern Chatham Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Pittsboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Pittsboro, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Apex, Holly Springs, Morrisville, Crosswinds Boating Center and New Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Boaters on the open water and those camping outdoors are especially vulnerable to the dangers of lightning. Seek harbor immediately and find safe shelter in a nearby building or vehicle.
